code: import{Component}from"react";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class App extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={colors:["white","white","white","white","white","white","white","white","white"],clickCount:0,clickOrder:[]};this.boxClicked=index=>{const{colors,clickCount,clickOrder}=this.state;if(colors[index]==="white"){colors[index]="green";clickOrder.push(index);this.setState({colors:colors,clickCount:clickCount+1});if(clickCount+1===9){this.changeBoxColorToOrange();}}};this.changeBoxColorToOrange=()=>{const{colors,clickOrder}=this.state;for(let i=0;i<clickOrder.length;i++){const index=clickOrder[i];setTimeout(()=>{colors[index]="orange";this.setState({colors:colors});},i*550);}};}render(){const{colors}=this.state;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"matrix-app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"main-heading",children:"3x3 Matrix App"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"matrix",children:colors.map((color,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"box",style:{backgroundColor:color},onClick:()=>this.boxClicked(index),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:index+1})},index))})]});}}export default App;
